titles.title: Promoting Resilient Supply Chains Act of 2025
Promoting Resilient Supply Chains Act of 2025
Promoting Resilient Supply Chains Act of 2025
Promoting Resilient Supply Chains Act of 2025
Promoting Resilient Supply Chains Act of 2025

To establish a critical supply chain resiliency and crisis response program in the Department of Commerce, and to secure American leadership in deploying emerging technologies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 50 - 1.
Reported by the Committee on Energy and Commerce. H. Rept. 119-68.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 45.

action.text: Mr. Bilirakis moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2444.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

calendar.text: Received in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 62.

committee.name: House Energy and Commerce
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
